options.name: force
options.description: Forces new requests when navigating back/forward

options.name: jump
options.description: Jump page to top on render

options.name: modal
options.description: Flag for content loaded into modal

options.name: tracking.legacy
options.description: Flag for legacy Google Analytics tracking

options.name: tracking.variable
options.description: Tag Manager dataLayer variable name (macro in Tag Manager)

options.name: tracking.event
options.description: Tag Manager event name (rule in Tag Manager)

options.name: transitionOut
options.description: Transition timing callback; should return user defined $.Deferred object, which must eventually resolve

events.name: request.asap
events.description: Before request is made; triggered on window. Second parameter 'true' if pop event

events.name: progress.asap
events.description: As request is loaded; triggered on window

events.name: loaded.asap
events.description: After request is loaded; triggered on window

events.name: render.asap
events.description: After state is rendered; triggered on window

events.name: error.asap
events.description: After load error; triggered on window

name: ASAP
description: A jQuery plugin for asynchronous page loads.
